Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the sale of medetomidine
Summary: Provides that no corporation, partnership, limited liability company, firm, online platform, or any other business entity doing business in this state shall knowingly sell, offer for sale, or deliver medetomidine to individuals without proof of its intended use for institutional, veterinary, or scientific purposes.
LawCode: Add ยง392-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the sale of medetomidine
